author: Mariam Abdullahi
title: Pastor Ibiyeomie’s Testimony: From Giving N5,000 to Receiving N25,000 and Foodstuff
text:
Sharing his testimony, the presiding pastor of Salvation Ministries, David Ibiyeomie, revealed that a decision to give God his N5,000 salary in 1997 resulted in a series of miracles.
This revelation was made in a video posted on Instagram by the televangelist on May 28, 2024. Standing behind the pulpit, Ibiyeomie recounted how his wife had requested his N5,000 salary to go to the market.
However, he claimed that he heard a divine instruction to give the money to God instead, which he obediently did.
Shortly after offering the N5,000 to God, Ibiyeomie shared that he received N25,000, along with a bag of rice, beans, and a crate of eggs from an unidentified woman.
Reflecting on the incident, he recalled, “In 1997, my wife informed me of her intention to visit the market, and my salary was N5,000.”
“She mentioned the market trip to me, and I replied that I would join her. However, God’s voice directed me to give Him the N5,000. It seemed irrational!”
He emphasized the need for faith in carrying out such instructions, highlighting the importance of aligning actions with spiritual guidance.
Describing the turn of events, Ibiyeomie continued, “I offered the N5,000 as a sacrifice. Less than an hour later, a woman received a divine message to deliver N25,000, food items, and kitchen supplies to me without even meeting in person.”
To add to the miraculous sequence, the woman’s husband, known for his thriftiness, unexpectedly gifted her N1 million on the same day, leading to a subsequent job offer in Abuja.
The responses to Ibiyeomie’s account have varied among social media users, showcasing a range of opinions and perspectives.
One user, clifofoboss, remarked, “Format in which you can take all that someone has.”
While another user, Zonaempire, mentioned an alternate instance involving Pastor Sam Adeyemi, prompting further discussion and reflection.
Supporting Ibiyeomie’s testimony, users like temi. dayo_ and dj_joeteee expressed sentiments of faith and admiration for the pastor.
In contrast, some users, including Awojideamos, raised questions and urged for diverse discussions beyond giving as a focal point.
Others, like prettiesttiana and Ciponi4real, sought clarification on discerning the voice of God and shared personal anecdotes related to acts of giving and faith.
